cast.name: 普佳里妮·高什 Pujarini Ghosh
菩提萨陀·莫俊达尔 Bodhisattva Mazumdar
比肖吉特·查克拉博蒂 Biswajit Chakraborty

writer.name: 罗宾德拉纳特·泰戈尔 Rabindranath Tagore

introduction: Young spirited Nanda Sen leaves his city home and luxury of urban life to join as the village Postmaster of Plassey where his life was comforted with the service of orphan low-caste housemaid Ratna and his only friend there school teacher Rabibabu. Ratna's charm appealed to him and Nanda married her against society and family. Succumbed to his father's last wish to marry a suitable match, Nanda landed in a crisis and escaped his desired family life. Nanda couldn't overcome this sin and finds solace in the next life.
